item.title: Get index mapping
item.description: Get index mapping # Returns mapping information about one or more indices under the specified collection. Examples # Get the mapping information of the my-index index under collection my-collection: GET /my-collection/_index/my-index/_mapping Request # GET /<target>/_index/<index>/_mapping GET /<target>/_index/_mapping Path Parameters # target (Required, String) Comma-separated, names of the collections to specify (wildcard supported) index (Optional, String) Comma-separated, names of the indices to get (wildcard supported)
